summary: Hodgepodge of Solstheim armors I personally use while mucking about in the ash.
descriptionHtml: Not a mod I plan on supporting much. Just thought I\'d share my personal Dragonbone armor. Armor can be found in Severin Manor in the chest LEFT of safe, in the main bedroom. Like my previous mod, this was originally made for the character I play. Which is a male nord 100% weight slider. Not sure how smaller characters will react, but for females in will show up as regular ol\' dragonplate. Stats are slightly above daedric.
author: hass21
